channel.title: Symfony on Scott O'Brien
channel.description: Recent content in Symfony on Scott O'Brien

item.title: Symfony not sortable in CRUD
item.description: I’ve recently come up across some problems with the CRUD generator in Symfony, so in case anyone is googling for a solution out there, I’ll try and help you along (or at least bump up the page references to the articles that helped me ðŸ˜‰ ) I had a problem today where I was trying to use Symfony’s (1.4) generate-admin CRUD generator. The issue was that my titles were not sortable when adjusting the fields to display in the generator.
